name: Po-Go-No!
description:
In this psychedelic, colorful and retro-style arcade game, use your pogo stick to bounce between different floor tiles and find the optimal path to achieve a big score! Po-Go-No! is a simple but fun challenge to your skills and reflexes. A pogo stick frenzy!

> Main features/characteristics:
- Six types of tile/floor:
+100 score points;
+500 score points;
-100 score points;
-500 score points;
GO! (+1 sec of invincibility, up to 20 seconds total when accumulated);
NO! (-1 live).
- Different enemies with random movement;
- Shooting objects (canons);
- Three lives per run;
- Score Attack;
- Linear difficulty;
- Hi-Score autosave.
